titleStmt.title: A second letter to Mr. Miles Prance in reply to the ghost of Sir Edmond-bury Godfrey
titleStmt.author: Everett, George, Shipwright.
Paine, William.

notesStmt.note: Variously attributed to William Paine and George Everett.
This item at reel 285:8as Wing P192 (number cancelled in Wing CD-ROM, 1996) and as Wing E3548B at reel 1614:52.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library and the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
